These Excel templates, created as part of the 'Making Data Count' programme, allow you to create statistical process control charts without the use of any code. Values can be entered into the templates, and there are various parameters that can be tweaked.

![](spc_excel.png)

There are separate templates for creating a single SPC chart at a time or creating up to 25 SPC charts at a time.

<br>

This video covers the use of the single plot tool.

{{< video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sWndrZ68Xww >}}
